item.title: It seemed that nothing could topple the U.S. dollar. Then came the Trump tariffs.

item.title: He broke the Bank of England — now he’s coming for America. How to bet with this trading legend using ETFs.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
